name: Wally the Seal 2
summary:
The new entry in the Wally The Seal series arrives! You were able to escape the mazes last time, but your second go around won't be so easy!

In Wally The Seal 2, your objective is to find and collect 4 mysterious flowers from each of the levels. Use the new Salmon Radar to track the flowers while avoiding Wally The Seal and his partner Mrs. Wally.
